titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State should designate a special envoy to negotiate the release of Americans held hostage in Lebanon.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Europe and the Middle East.

bill.summary: 2/22/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of State should designate a special envoy to negotiate the release of American and all other hostages in Lebanon, and appeals to their captors to free them.
